name: They Might Byte!
description:
currently in development game for Global Game Jam 2022

They Might Byte! Raise your little monster from a baby to adult. How you care for it will influence what it evolves into. Watch it battle or make friends as it grows!

Sound Design: Michael Bozdeck-Cubillos
Art: Beryl Allee
Code: Peteringo & Ryan Guthrie
